title: 3 Tips for Time Management & My Homestead Schedule
itunes:title: 3 Tips for Time Management & My Homestead Schedule
description: One of the questions I get asked the most is how do you manage to get so much done with work and a homestead? Today I'm sharing the truth about balance, seasons, and the fallacy of doing it all. I also give tips on how I've learned to keep the homestead functioning while still working a full-time job (including a day job off the homestead) and what my current schedule looks like. For links/resource https://melissaknorris.com/261  Get The Family Garden Plan HTTP://familygardenplan.com
